title: Self-Management Competency Enhancement Program for Patients with Knee Osteoarthritis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic health management knowledge and general understanding of chronic diseases
context.additional_context: Task-centered learning for developing data-driven self-management strategies using digital devices and applying them to real-life contexts

learning_goals: Reduce pain during walking (initial, stair, long-distance) by over 30% after six months by applying pain management techniques
Shorten the Sit-to-Stand (STS) test time by 20% after six months through physical function assessments
Achieve confidence in self-management abilities at 4.0 or above on a 5-point scale after six months through self-efficacy surveys
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
